title: Ford debt has been downgraded to junk
text:
Frankfurt, Germany (CNN Business) Moody's downgraded Ford's credit to junk Monday evening. It said the automaker faces considerable business challenges, and its poor financial performance badly positions Ford to take on its planned $11 billion restructuring.

"Ford is undertaking this restructuring from a weak position as measures of cash flow and profit margins are below our expectations, and below the performance of investment-grade rated auto peers," Moody's said.

News of the downgrade sent Ford shares down 3% in premarket trading Tuesday. They ended the day 1.3% lower.
